rawText:
ABISHAK.I 
Contact 
Address: 
1/673 East  valasai  street ,pamban, 
Rameswaram . pincode-(623521) 
 
 
Phone: 
8489044240  
 
Email: 
jovialabishak@gmail.com 
Languages 
English 
Tamil 
Hobbies 
 Writing 
 Sketching 
 Photography 
Skill Highlights 
 Project 
management 
 Strong 
decision 
maker 
 Complex 
problem 
solver 
 Creative 
design 
 Innovative 
 Service-
focused 
 
Summary 
Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web 
projects. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including 
HTML5, PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, bootstrap,CSS, MySQL. Strong 
background in project management and customer relations. 
Experience 
Associate Software Developer- 09/2021 to Till now 
Ardhas Technology India Pvt.LTd, Coimbatore 
 Cooperate with developer to create clean interfaces and 
simple, intuitive interactions and experiences. 
 Develop project concepts and maintain optimal workflow. 
 Work with senior developer to manage large, complex design 
projects for corporate clients. 
 Complete detailed programming and development tasks for 
front end and internal websites as well as challenging back-end 
server code. 
 Carry out quality assurance tests to discover errors and 
optimize usability. 
 
Web Developer (Inter)-06/2021 -08/2021 
 Work with senior developer to manage projects for corporate 
clients. 
 Complete detailed programming and development tasks for 
front end and internal websites as well as challenging back-end 
server code. 
Education 
K.S.Rangasamy College of Technology ,Namakkal, Tamil Nadu . 
Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical Engineering May 2019  
 CGPA: 7.20/10 
Adharsh Vidhyalaya Hr. Sec. School , Erode , Tamil Nadu . 
Higher SecondarySchooling May 2015 
 Percentage : 76.33 
St.Anne’s Matriculation School ,Rameswaram, Tamil Nadu . 
SSLC Schooling May 2013 
 Percentage : 84 
Programming Skill 
PHP Framework:Laravel. 
Programming Languages: JavaScript, HTML5, PHP, Bootstrap, CSS,  
MySQL.
